CustomBehavior.Macro: /run for i=1,GetNumQuestLogEntries() do SelectQuestLogEntry(i); SetAbandonQuest(); AbandonQuest(); end

PickUp.QuestName: Mission: The Murketh and Shaadraz Gateways

TurnIn.QuestName: Mission: The Murketh and Shaadraz Gateways

PickUp.QuestName: A Job for an Intelligent Man

TurnIn.QuestName: A Job for an Intelligent Man

CustomBehavior.TerminateWhen: Unit(16878, u => u.HasAura(39184) && u.IsAlive) != null || Unit(22454, u => u.IsAlive) != null
Unit(16878, u => u.HasAura(39184) && u.IsAlive) == null || Unit(22454, u => u.IsAlive) != null

If.Condition: Me.Class == WoWClass.Hunter || Me.Class == WoWClass.Rogue || Me.Class == WoWClass.Monk

CustomBehavior.TerminateWhen: Unit(16951, u => u.IsAlive && u.Distance < 40) != null || Unit(16901, u => u.IsAlive && u.Distance < 40) != null
Unit(16929, u => u.IsAlive && u.Distance < 40) != null || Unit(16927, u => u.IsAlive && u.Distance < 40) != null
